PositiveEntailmentTest.purpose: Test interaction between rdfs:subClassOf, rdf:type, ## and # in RIF
PositiveEntailmentTest.description: In RIF-RDF combinations, we have that rdf:type statements are equivalent to RIF # statements and RIF ## statements imply rdfs:subClassOf statements. By the RDFS semantics we have that ex:a rdf:type ex:D must hold and by the semantics of combinations, we have that ex:a rdf:type ex:D implies ex:a # ex:D. Therefore, ex:a # ex:D is derived.
